game

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Entity

  • public class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represents all "living" entities in the game. This includes both the main character and the enemies. This class was adapted from Mr. Shelby's Mario class in the AnimationDemoProcession Demo
    Author:
    Lead: Nicole Spaulding

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Creates an instance of an Entity with a specified animation, type, lives, and (x, y) coordinates

        Parameters:
        a - the specified animation
        type - A string to specify the type of entity
        lives - The number of lives this entity has
        x - x-coordinate
        y - y-coordinate
